questions.title: 我对这个项目很感兴趣。
questions.answer: I am very interested in the project.

questions.title: 我丈夫对冬泳感兴趣。
questions.answer: My husband is interested in swimming in winter.

questions.title: 她对温室效应的话题很感兴趣。
questions.answer: She is very interested in the theme of greenhouse effect.

questions.title: 我儿子对冬天吃冰淇淋、夏天吃火锅感兴趣。
questions.answer: My son is interested in eating ice cream in winter and eating chafingdish in summer.

questions.title: 人类对怎么挣更多的钱感兴趣。
questions.answer: Human beings are interested in how to earn more money.

title: ——我对那个穿红衣服的女孩有意思。
——让我来为你引荐。

answer.en: I'm interested in the girl in red.

title: ——你是喜欢爱情片还是喜剧片？
——都不喜欢，我对纪录片和文艺片感兴趣。

answer.en: Would you like affectional films or comedy films?
I like neither, I'm interested in documentary films and literary films.
